content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'd be happy to help you schedule an appointment. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Mr. Walsh. May I have your home address so we can verify service availability in your area?
Thank you. To make sure we send the right specialist, could you describe the issue you're having with your HVAC system?
What do you mean describe? Just fix the thing, it doesnâ€™t work.

I understand, Mr. Walsh. Even a little information can help our technician prepare. Is the system blowing air but not cooling, not turning on at all, or making any unusual noises? Any details will help.
Why do you people always ask so many questions? Just send somebody already.
Thank you for your patience, Mr. Walsh. I understand your frustration. To move forward, may I ask when would be the best time for our technician to visit?
